overview: In the heart of ancient China, two brothers are hunting fox, this mad journey will have them face treason, bravery, hatred and love.  A fox tale is a short movie made by 4 students in 2011 at the french school Supinfocom Arles.  Main softwares used :3dsmax, Photoshop, After Effects and Premiere Pro.
tagline: In the heart of ancient China, two brothers are hunting fox, this mad journey will have them face treason, bravery, hatred and love.
title: A Fox Tale
